title: Can't see game
body:
My launcher is working but after champion select,when champions are loading,on my screen appears " H.V Frequency Over Range " 

I thought it would be time to repair but it's still happening.
Since it was released patch 7.1 that started.
If you can help me somehow please help,please.
I cant wait,i want to play with my friends but i cant...
Ty anyways <3

replies.body: same issue they told me they'd get back to me too, that was like 2 weeks ago and still havn't heard from anyone

There was an issue recently that caused some players to see a message like this, and pressing Alt+Enter served as a workaround.  This toggled your full screen and restored the game.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate your issue and work with you individually to see what's causing this for you.  We'll reply back asap!
